h2_title: Yaoguai King Boss Fight - Hundred-Eyed Daoist Master
content: Most times, he'll also begin the fight with stamping down with his two front talons, following up with a quick sword slash, and will then imbue his sword with lightning for a moment, before triggering a delayed downward slash to electrify you.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Temple_of_Yellow_Flowers_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Temple of Yellow Flowers Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Yaoguai King Boss Fight - Hundred-Eyed Daoist Master'.
The content is as follows:
Most times, he'll also begin the fight with stamping down with his two front talons, following up with a quick sword slash, and will then imbue his sword with lightning for a moment, before triggering a delayed downward slash to electrify you.
